== Ubuntu Local Team Table ==

We have a table at <nowiki>[[http://www.oscon.com/oscon2010| OSCON]]</nowiki> July 19-23 in Portland, Oregon.

=== Booth Volunteers ===

Please add yourself if you're planning to spend at least a little time while at the Ubuntu Booth helping out.
* Exhibitor Registration/Move-In: 
   Tuesday, July 20, 8:00AM - 6:00PM 

* Exhibit Hall Hours:
   Wednesday, July 21 10:00AM - 4:30PM / 6:00PM - 7:00PM - Expo Hall Reception
   Thursday,  July 22 10:00AM - 5:00PM

* Exhibitor Move-out:
   July 22, 5:00PM - 9:00PM
   July 23, 8:00AM - 12:00PM
 

Add your name to this list if you aren't yet sure when you can be help at the booth, but you plan to stop by for a while:

* Valorie
* Eric
* Mike
* Mark
* Dan

=== Why? ===
* help us promote local Teams.
* give people a chance to learn what Ubuntu & FOSS have to offer 
* get some new folks involved
